LanguageData.Bullet_Tyrant.label: impact shell
LanguageData.KineticRifle.label: kinetic rifle
LanguageData.KineticRifle.description: The "Tyrant" is a service rifle of the Tisiphone Hunter Contingent. Created for close quarters combat, one of the great advantages of the Tyrant is its cutting edge targeting systems for rapid target acquiring and tracking.
LanguageData.Bullet_Tormentor.label: impact shell
LanguageData.KineticPistol.label: kinetic pistol
LanguageData.KineticPistol.description: Standard issue sidearm of the Tisiphone Hunter Contingent, the "Tormentor" is a fast firing personal defense weapon.
LanguageData.Bullet_Oppressor.label: kinetic canister
LanguageData.ThuddGun.label: thudd gun
LanguageData.ThuddGun.description: Unlike other ordinary close quarter combat weapon, the "Oppressor" canister rifle fires charged kinetic energy canister. It can be dangerous, even from afar.
LanguageData.Bullet_Wailer.label: impact shell
LanguageData.KineticLongRifle.label: kinetic long rifle
LanguageData.KineticLongRifle.description: Built for rapid counter snipe against the Federation snipers, the greatest strength of the "Wailer" is surprisingly fast target acquisition capability for the sniper rifle.
LanguageData.Bullet_Atrocity.label: kinetic canister
LanguageData.StormCannon.label: storm cannon
LanguageData.StormCannon.description: The "Atrocity" area suppression system was designed for suppressing multiple target from afar. The Atrocity's great maneuverability made its reputation as a fearsome support weapon.
